My 2 boys have attended this school and they love it. The older one has graduated to primary school and the younger one is still there.
My older son has attained a solid foundation in his core subjects thanks to the dedication by his teachers in this school. Special shout out to 王老师 and Mrs Koh for their guidance.
My younger son is also thriving in this school.
The teachers are dedicated, passionate and caring. The environment is conducive to learning, and a loving one too.
On special occasions, there are celebrations conducted and the communal spirit is strong.
Strongly recommend this school.

As a mum of two i couldn't be happier with the experience my children have had at Little Olive Tree. This preschool has been a true blessing for my daughter and my son. The teachers have created a nurturing environment where children feel safe, loved, and encouraged to explore and learn. The curriculum is throughtfully designed, striking a perfect balance between structured activities and free play. My children have thrived as they engage in age-appropriate educational experience that foster their cognitive, social and emotional development.

Thankful for the team here. We know our children are in safe hands.
Also appreciate the effort to organize fun activities and outings for the children and our extended family to spend meaningful time together.

I like this school as teacher Jhonalyn was very attentive to the development of my daughter. She observed in details and record how my girl responds in class and interact with other friends. Principal Priscilla is also dedicated to the children development and bring in some new ideas to the school from time to time.

We absolutely love BPCDC and so do my children. It has a very homey feeling and the child to teacher ratio is great. Our 3 kids had the whole wonderful experiences from PG to 6 year-old kinder. Amazing staff with so much heart and caring mindset. We love the veggie and herbs garden. We love the sustainability ideas introduced to the children since young. It not only helps the children understand the concept of food and learn about the process of farm to plate through growing their own vegetables but also train them eat green as well! From amazing chef, Aunty Tan/ Aunty Wen, Janitor, Aunty Ping to Educators-Teacher Cel,  Mrs Koh, Lim lao shi(Michelle), Teacher Jane, Hong En lao shi, Teacher Adeline, Ai Ling lao shi, Chen Lao Shi, Mrs Tan and other newly joined educators to Principal, Ms Sim, thank you for keeping our children safe, well-fed, happily entertained, loved and cared for throughout their early childhood education at BPCDC! Highly recommended!
